snippet.title: INVERTIGO demo - official trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the free demo:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1659520/Invertigo/

INVERTIGO is a first-person sci-fi puzzle-platformer where you have to manipulate GRAVITY to solve puzzles. Explore the abandoned facility and advance through the rooms.

Join our Discord community for sneak peeks, speed-running, and updates! https://discord.gg/Upqgb7MSAg

Music & trailer created by talented https://www.youtube.com/@AquaNovaOfficial6621
